CustomField.formula: NOT( ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) || ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(OrderDetail_Cnt__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "Charter") && NOW() > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(LoadingDate__c - 1) & " 9:00:00") /* 9:00:00Z GMT = 18時JST */ && ( ISBLANK(PickingedQuantity_Sum__c) || OrderDetailQuantity_Sum__c <> PickingedQuantity_Sum__c )
CustomField.label: 翌日出荷分のピッキングリスト遅延フラグ
